# description from https://github.com/threathunters-io/laurel/issues/232
#
# I set label-exe.'^/opt/splunk/bin/splunk-optimize' =
# 'test-splunk-optimize' in the config.toml and this works fine
#
# Then I set filter-labels = ["test-splunk-optimize"] and
# filter-action = "drop" It seems that this is not working properly as
# the events are not filtered. The same behavior occurs with
# filter-keys and filter-raw-lines.
#
